General.Name: Crown Advanced Material Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Crown Advanced Material Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of new composite membrane materials in China. Its products include solar cell backsheets, aluminum-plastic films, special protective films, solar cell encapsulation films, and lithium battery soft package packaging materials. Crown Advanced Material Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Yichun, China.
